data.code_commit_message:
feat(ANEM): Add GPIO, Timer, and UART peripherals with tests

Implement three memory-mapped I/O peripherals:
- GPIO (0xFFD0-D3): 2-port, 16-bit, per-bit tristate with direction registers
- Timer (0xFFD7-DA): 16-bit counter, prescaler, compare match, auto-reload
- UART (0xFFDB-DE): TX/RX FSMs, 16x oversampling baud, loopback-verified

All existing 57 tests pass (no regressions). New tests: 8 GPIO + 5 Timer + 6 UART = 19.
Total: 72 tests passing.
